select-by-device.caption: Atmel QTouch Library for Atmel SAM

module.caption: Atmel QTouch Library 4.4 for Atmel SAM3X devices
module.info: This is the Atmel QTouch Library for Atmel SAM3X that consists of one api header file (touch_api.h) and the required library files. All projects using this library must also provide the required header file(touch_qt_config.h) used to configure the library. For more information on the Atmel QTouch Library, check www.atmel.com/qtouchlib.
